name: Rapidcents Payment Gateway
author: International Payment Solutions

sections.description:
This plugin is a 3rd party for www.rapidcents.com services.
Rapidcents Payment Gateway Accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB and more directly on your store with the Rapidcents payment gateway for WooCommerce.

More about rapidcents :

https://www.rapidcents.com/services/
Privacy Policy : https://rapidcents.com/privacy-policy/

Take Credit card payments easily and directly on your store

The Rapidcents plugin extends WooCommerce allowing you to take payments directly on your store via Rapidcent’s API.

Rapidcents is a simple way to accept payments online. With Stripe you can accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, JCB directly on your store.

Why choose Rapidcents?

Rapidcents has no setup fees, no monthly fees, no hidden costs: you only get charged when you earn money!.
sections.installation:
You can download it from rapidcents.com.

Please note, v4 of this gateway requires WooCommerce 3.0 and above.

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of the WooCommerce Rapidcents plugin, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Rapidcents Payment Gateway” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly, of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”, then “Activate”.
